title: Didn't get Kayle Skin
body: Hello guys. I got the Birthday Poro icon and Kayle herself, but I didn't get the Riot Kayle skin. Please fix. Thanks in advance.

replies.body: Hey i still didn't get the skin :({{champion:10}}

We're sending out the content in waves to ensure it gets out properly. This means you won't get all the gifts at once. We've extended the deadline to the 30th, so let me know if you don't have anything after then.

The gifts are being sent separately, so you may not get everything all at the same time.  Most players have received their gifts by now, but we're not done just yet per the current [support banner](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/227317608--Sept-14-Anniversary-gifts-are-currently-being-distributed-You-may-not-receive-them-right-away-so-please-be-patient-).  Hang tight until this is all wrapped up, and you'll have the goods!

Greetings!

The time limit was extended to September 30. due to some problems. I'm pretty sure you'll both get the gift before that date. If not you can send in a support ticket.

Please do not send in a ticket yet as they're still handing out gifts 

- Okuma

Same thing just happened to me. I'm like, "I thought I was suppose to get both Kayle and Riot Kayle which is why I didn't buy her ahead of time....."
I don't know of it is an error or intentional.
